snippet: The bill sought to impose fines and prison terms on doctors who perform abortions on women who are trying to select the gender of their offspring.
abstract: House votes 246 to 168 to reject a measure that sought to impose fines and prison terms on doctors who perform abortions on women who are trying to select the gender of their offspring.
lead_paragraph: The bill sought to impose fines and prison terms on doctors who perform abortions on women who are trying to select the gender of their offspring.

headline.seo: House Rejects Bill to Ban Sex-Selective Abortions
headline.main: House Rejects Bill to Ban Sex-Selective Abortions
headline.print_headline: House Rejects Bill to Ban Sex-Selective Abortions
